home.heroDescription: Scan thousands of barcodes at once and transmit to PC in real-time. Professional scanner optimized for inventory management, logistics, and warehouse operations.
home.ctaDescription: Boost your inventory management efficiency with a free download

bulkScan.title: Ultra-Fast Bulk Scanning
bulkScan.description: Scan thousands of barcodes quickly in continuous scan mode. Reduce inventory time by 90%.

realtime.title: Real-time PC Transfer
realtime.description: Scanned data appears instantly in your PC web browser. No additional software required.

export.title: CSV/Excel Export
export.description: Export scan history to CSV or Excel files. Easily integrates with ERP and WMS systems.

offline.title: Offline Mode
offline.description: Scan without internet. Works in warehouses, basements, and areas with poor network.

allBarcodes.title: All Barcode Support
allBarcodes.description: Recognizes 30+ barcode formats including QR, EAN-13, Code128, UPC-A, DataMatrix.

validation.title: Barcode Validation
validation.description: Automatic checksum verification prevents incorrect barcode entries. Maintains accurate inventory data.

logistics.title: Logistics Centers
logistics.description: Inbound/outbound barcode scanning, inventory checks, picking list verification

warehouse.title: Warehouse Managers
warehouse.description: Inventory location tracking, location barcode scanning

retail.title: Retail Stores
retail.description: Product receiving, price tag checking, inventory surveys

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Material tracking, production line monitoring, quality control

q1.question: Is QR Scanner Pro free?
q1.answer: Yes, QR Scanner Pro is free to download and use. All basic scanning features are free, and you can upgrade to Pro version for premium features.

q2.question: How can I use QR Scanner Pro for inventory management?
q2.answer: QR Scanner Pro's bulk scan mode lets you continuously scan thousands of barcodes and transmit them to PC in real-time or export to CSV/Excel files. It's optimized for warehouse, logistics center, and retail store inventory.

q3.question: What makes QR Scanner Pro different from other scanner apps?
q3.answer: QR Scanner Pro is designed for business use, offering professional features like bulk scanning, real-time PC transfer, multiple barcode format support, and offline mode. Unlike regular QR scanners, it's optimized for inventory management workflows.

q4.question: How do I transfer scan data to PC in real-time?
q4.answer: Enable receive mode on scanview.app website, then enter the same connection code in the app. Scanned barcodes will appear on your PC screen in real-time. No additional software installation needed - just a web browser.

q5.question: Which barcode formats are supported?
q5.answer: We support 30+ barcode formats including QR Code, EAN-13, EAN-8, UPC-A, UPC-E, Code128, Code39, Code93, ITF, Codabar, DataMatrix, PDF417, and Aztec.

footer.description: Professional QR code barcode scanner optimized for inventory management, logistics, and warehouse operations
